dialogues.text: I don’t know what to believe. But IT am pretty sure I don’t believe you. She drives off. She slows down for a red, then it turns green and she takes off. Before she can Andy drives his b in front of her car, and drives from side to side so she can’t get past him.

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: Look at me, I collect action figures. Look how I walk. I ride a bicycle to work. And I date the most wonderful, beautiful woman in the world and I don’t just grab her and ravage her, (beat) Because I’m a virgin.

dialogues.speaker: TRISH
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: It almost happened a bunch of times when I was younger, but it didn’t work out, then when I got older there were some close calls that went kind of bad. Then I got seared. Then I gave up. Then TI got more scared, Then I met you. Trish stops the car. She stays in the car as he speaks to her.

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: I’m sorry I didn‘t teil you right away.  108. ANDY (cont'd) (beat) So? (beat) Don’t leave me hanging here. What do you think? Am I defective? Am I abnormal? Trish kisses him hard on the lips. It is very passionate. They kiss for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: TRISH
dialogues.text: Andy, the most important thing in my life is my family. I know that from the outside my situation may not seem like a bed of roses, but it is.

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: I know. And I want to be a part of it.

dialogues.speaker: TRISH
dialogues.text: T love you, Andy.

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: I love you, Trish.

dialogues.speaker: TRISH
dialogues.text: Now what do we do? Andy thinks about this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy and Trish are getting married. Everyone is there, al her kids even the twenty six year old and her daughter, everyone from work, Jay is there with Jill, David is back together with his ex-girlfriend, Cal is there with the tattooed woman from speed dating. Aboojay from work is th with his date, Beth.

dialogues.speaker: PRIEST
dialogues.text: You may now kiss the bride. Andy and Trish kiss. The crowd explodes with cheers. They run down the path as children throw flowers at them. cur TO:  ios.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy and Trish are in bed, under the covers.

dialogues.speaker: TRISH
dialogues.text: Are you ready?

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: Yeah. Definitely.

dialogues.speaker: TRISH
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: Wait! I need another second. He takes a deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: ANDY
dialogues.text: Now I'm ready.

dialogues.speaker: TRISH
dialogues.text: Here we go. The screen fades to black. GRAPHIC UP: “THE END”

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andy walks out of his room. MUSTC UP: “THE AGE OF AQUARIUS” Andy is overjoyed. He breaks into a very elaborate dance. The employees of the hotel join him in the happiest dance sequence ever filmed. Trish comes out and joins in. It is like the Central Park scene from “Hair.” It is a new day for Andy.
